loans.name: Jakelin

texts.es:
La señora Jakelin tiene un Internet que esta en alquiler, vive en casa de sus padres en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento su vivienda da esta ubicada en la zona Escobar Uria de la ciudad de La Paz 
La señora Jakelin atiende en su Internet de lunes a domingo atendiendo mas de diez horas al día juntamente con su esposo que realiza trabajos de serigrafía; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de una fotocopiadora para mejorar sus ingresos y cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua de ella y su familia.

 El sueño de Jakelin es ampliar su negocio y tener casa propia para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia
Es la tercera vez con IMPRO y la primera con Kiva.
texts.en: Jakelin rents an Internet café that she operates.  She lives in her parents’ brick house with a cement floor located in the city of La Paz’s Escobar Uria zone.  Jakelin runs her Internet from Monday to Sunday for more than ten hours daily together with her husband who does silk-screening.  She needs the loan to buy a photocopier to improve her income and cover food, electricity and water costs for her and her family.  Jakelin’s dream is to expand the business and have a house of her own to improve her family’s quality of life.  This is her third time with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy a photocopying machine.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Carlos es asesor legal, su nivel de educación es licenciatura, vive en casa propia con uno de sus hijos con un acabado fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda esta ubicada en la zona de tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
El señor Carlos es abogado del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz agua teléfono; el credito lo requiere para terminar  la refaccion de su vivienda, pues con un préstamo anterior comenzó la refacción y ahora desea terminar  y asi mejorar su calidad de vida y de su hijo.
El sueño de Carlos es terminar de refaccionar su vivienda comprara estuco, pintura, cemento.

Es la tercera vez con IMPRO y la segunda con Kiva.
texts.en: Carlos is a legal consultant; he has a Bachelor’s degree.  He lives in his own house with fine finishing and hardwood floors located in the city of La Paz’s Tembladerani zone.  He’s an attorney and generates income to cover his food, electricity, water and telephone costs.  He needs the loan to finish refurbishing his house because with the previous loan he was able to start the refurbishing and now he wants to finish it thus improving his and his son’s quality of life.  Carlos’ dream is to finish the refurbishing and will buy stucco, paint and cement.  This is the third time with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy stucco and paint to continue refurbishing his house.

loans.name: Marcia

texts.es:
La señora Marcia trabaja como portera y vive en su mismo trabajo con un acabado fino y piso de cemento, su trabajo esta ubicado en la zona de villa copacabana de la ciudad de  La Paz.

 Marcia, además de  ser portera, los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de comida, para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de un horno industrial y así tener la herramienta para trabajar mejor y mejorar su calidad de vida.

El sueño de Marcia es tener su casa propia y ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos 

Es la tercera vez con IMPRO y la tercera con Kiva.
texts.en: Marcia works as a building superintendent and lives in her place of work; it has fine finish and a cement floor.  Her work is located in the city of La Paz’s Villa Copacabana zone.  Marcia, aside from being a building superintendent, works weekends selling food to cover her food, electricity and water costs.  She needs the loan to buy an industrial oven and thus have the tool to work better and improve her quality of life.  Marcia’s dream is to have a house of her own and to offer her children a better quality of life.  This is the third time with IMPRO and third with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paint, sandpaper, thinner, and gasoline, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Ivan Jose

texts.es:
Iván con 33 años de edad, padre de 2 hijos entre las edades de 2 y 12 años, casado, con un conocimiento académico de tercer año de secundaria, de oficio comerciante. El anteriormente  trabajaba  en una empresa en donde vendían cemento, pero luego se salió del trabajo porque tuvo un accidente y fue allí que  decidió ir a trabajar con su hermano. Actualmente el se dedica a atender mini pulpería, en donde vende un poco de mercadería variada como lapicero, pega, cuadernos, ropa, calcetines etc, el vende de forma ambulante, le gustaría dar a conocer sus productos que vende en otra ciudades, sus expectativas es ampliar su negocio para incrementar sus ventas y  asi le genere mayores ingresos.
Iván solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería en general como ropa, zapato, pega, calcetines,  etc. El considera que al comprar estos productos le será de mucha  ayuda porque así podrá surtir su negocio con productos mas solicitados por sus clientes. Sus planes futuros  es cancelar este préstamo  y solicitar  un nuevo crédito para seguir  invirtiendo en su  negocio.
texts.en:
Iván, 33, is married and the father of two children, ages 2 and 12.  He finished the third year of secondary school and works as a merchant.  Previously he worked in a cement company, but he left when he had an accident.  Then he decided to go to work with his brother.

Currently he tends a mini-grocery store where he sells a variety of merchandise such as pens, glue, notebooks, clothing, socks, etc.  He sells as a street vendor.  He would like to sell his products in other cities.  His expectations are to expand his business to increase sales and generate more income.

Iván is requesting the loan to buy general merchandise such as clothing, shoes, glue, socks, etc.  He thinks that buying these products will be a big help because he'll be able to supply his business with the products his customers request most.

His future plans are to pay back this loan and request another one to continue investing in his business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, glue, socks, and other general merchandise

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru:
Оксана замужем, у нее двое детей. У Оксаны есть свой бизнес - она продает вещи на рынке. Работает уже восемь лет. Бизнес развивается успешно.

Оксана живет в доме, который в холодное время отапливается дровами (печное отопление). Оксана просит предоставить ей кредит для покупки газового котла и его усатановки. Газовый котел не только более удобен в эксплуатации, но и экономичен. Благодаря ему у Оксаны в доме будет не только тепло, но и горячая вода.
texts.en: Oksana is married and has 2 children. She has her own business selling clothing at the market. She has been doing this for 8 years, and her business is developing successfully. Oksana lives in a home that is heated by a wood-burning stove in the wintertime. She is seeking a loan to buy a gas boiler and pay for its installation. Gas boilers are not only more convenient to use, but are also more economical. Thanks to this type of heating system, Oksana will have both heat and hot water at home.

loans.use: to install a heating system in her home

loans.name: Mykhailo

texts.ru:
Михайло работает крановщиком. Ему 52 года, женат. Трое взрослых детей живут отдельно.
Михайло хочет установить новые окна, которе позволят ему уменьшить расходы на отопление, т.к. тепло будет сберегаться дольше. Михайло просит предоставить ему кредит в размере 10,000 гривен.
texts.en: Mykhailo works as a crane operator. He is 52 years old, married, and has 3 grown children who now live independently. He wants to install new windows that will allow him to decrease his heating expenses, as they will hold in the heat better. Mykhailo is seeking a loan of 10,000 Ukrainian Hryvnia.

loans.use: to install energy-saving windows

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
Francisco con 36 años de edad,  originario de la comarca el Llanito, Teustepe, casado, tiene dos hijos varones, uno le  ayuda en las labores agrícolas, y el otro  estudia el 5to año de secundaria en el instituto del pueblo. Es de oficio a agricultor siembra maíz  y  trigo, además tiene sus vaquitas las que ordeña y vende la leche para ayudarse en los gasto de la casa. Francisco dice que hace varios años  le  estuvo trabajando a otras personas, y con el dinero que fue  ahorrando pudo comprar su primera vaca. Actualmente el  trabaja en una finca  su jefe   le ayudo mucho ya que parte del ganado que tiene se lo vendió su propio jefe.

Francisco requiere  este crédito  para comprar una vaca. El estima que este crédito le ayudara a aumentar sus animales y mejorar la producción de leche, y asi poder mejorar  sus ingresos. Su siguiente meta es  pagar el crédito y luego solicitar otro para comprar mas ganado.
texts.en:
Francisco is 36 years old and originally from the Llanito settlement in Teustepe.  He’s married and has two sons; one helps with the farm work and the other attends the local high school.

[Francisco] is a farmer and raises corn and wheat.  He also has cows that he milks and sells the milk in order to help with the household expenses.  Francisco says that he was working with others several years ago, and he was able to buy his first cow with the money he saved up.  He currently works on a farm and his boss has helped him very much and sold him his livestock.

Francisco needs this loan to buy a cow.  He believes that this loan will help him to increase his number of animals and increase milk production so that he can increase his income.  His next goal is to pay off the loan and then request another to buy more livestock.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: El socio tiene 27 años de edad y pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de materiales de construcción como arena, fierro, yeso y otras cosas más. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como arena y piedra chancada. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: This member is 27 years old and belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre", which is part of the Arariwa organisation.  He earns his livelihood by selling building materials such as sand, metal and plaster, among other things.  On this occasion, he needs a loan to buy materials including sand and crushed stone.  He is grateful to those helping him to realise his dreams through this project, and is committed to making his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as sand and crushed stone.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
La joven Karina de 27 años de edad, vive con su esposo, tiene 02 hijos que dependen de ella,  no tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 04 años a su negocio. 
La Joven Karina tiene negocio de venta de ropa, sandalias y ropa interior y vende su mercadería de manera ambulante.
La Joven Karina vive en una comunidad  de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos que ha diario ella visita, se traslada  a las aldeas y barrios aledaños a su comunidad en bus, su producto lo compra  en el país vecino EL Salvador y en Tegucigalpa capital de Honduras.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de blusas, vestidos, faldas, camisas, pantalones, calzonetas y ropa interior, porque en esta época navideña se vende bastante este tipo de mercadería,  y con el apoyo del préstamo  espera mejorar un poco su condición de vida y la de su familia.
La Joven Karina su sueño es tener su casa propia y prosperar en su negocio. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre del 2012.
texts.en:
Young Karina is 27 years old, and she lives with her husband. She has two dependant children. She does not own her own home and has been running her own business for 4 years. 
Young Karina has a business selling clothes, sandals, and underwear, and she sells her merchandise from door to door. 
Young Karina lives in a district of San Lorenzo, to the south of Honduras. Her customers are the friends and neighbours that she visits every day. She travels on the bus to the villages and to neighbourhoods near her own district. She buys her goods in the neighbouring country El Salvador and in Tegucigalpa, the capital of Honduras. 
Karina is applying for this loan in order to buy blouses, dresses, shirts, trousers, swimwear and underwear, because during this Christmas season, this kind of merchandise sells quite well. With the help of this loan, she hopes to improve her quality of life a little, and that of her family. 
Young Karina’s dream is to own her own home and to prosper in her business. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, skirts, shirts, trousers, swimwear, and underwear for her business.

loans.name: Bone

texts.es: EL SEÑOR BONE,  TIENE 30  AÑOS DE EDAD, ES SOLTERO VIVEN EN LA COMUNIDAD DE TAKO TAKO ALTO DE LA  PROVINCIA  MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA,   LLEVA UNA VIDA SOLITARIA  YA QUE NO TIENE HIJOS COMPARTE SU VIDA CON LOS PARIENTES MÁS CERCANOS COMO SER SU ABUELITA, SU MADRE Y SOBRINOS, QUE LOS COLABORAN EN LA PRODUCCIÓN SEGÚN SUS POSIBILIDADES. TAMBIÉN TIENE UN PROBLEMA DE MAL FORMACIÓN DE HUESO PERONÉ QUE LE IMPIDE CAMINAR CON NORMALIDAD Y TRABAJAR.  POR LAS ESCASAS LLUVIAS PRESENTADAS EN LA ANTERIOR GESTIÓN AGRÍCOLA SE HA REDUCIDO EL CAUDAL DE LAS AGUAS SUBTERRÁNEAS EN LA ZONA, DON BONE HA PERDIDO GRAN CANTIDAD DE SU PRODUCCIÓN DE TOMATE YA QUE LA COMUNIDAD HA RESTRINGIDO EL USO DEL AGUA A LO MÍNIMO QUE NO HA CUBIERTO EL REQUERIMIENTO DE AGUA PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN EL CUAL A OCASIONANDO UNA DISMINUCIÓN DE INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS POR VENTA DE ESTOS PRODUCTOS, ES POR ESTOS MOTIVOS MENCIONADOS LA ESTABILIDAD ECONÓMICA HA SUFRIDO UN DESEQUILIBRIO AFECTANDO DIRECTAMENTE EN LA ADQUISICIÓN DE LOS MATERIALES E INSUMOS REQUERIDOS PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN COMO EN LA CANASTA FAMILIAR PARA LA ALIMENTACIÓN DE LOS JORNALEROS QUE EMPLEA. POR ESTO NECESITA UN PRÉSTAMO PARA COMPRAR INSUMOS AGRÍCOLAS, SEMILLAS, ETC. ESTO CON EL MOTIVO DE VOLVER A  SEMBRAR.
texts.en: Bone is 30 years old and single.  He lives in the community of Tako Tako Alto in the province of Mizque in the department of Cochabamba.  He lives a solitary life as he doesn’t have any children.  He shares his life with his closest relatives – his grandmother, his mother and his nephews – who assist in production as they are able.  Also he has a problem with the deformation of the fibula bone which prevents him from walking and working normally.  Because of the scarce rains en the previous agricultural season, the flow of underground water has decreased.  Bone has lost a large quantity of his production of tomatoes because the community has restricted the water usage to a minimum level which did not cover the water requirement for the production.  This has caused a reduction of his income from the sale of these products.  For the reasons mentioned, his economic stability has suffered a disequilibrium, directly affecting the acquisition of the materials and supplies required for the production such as the basic staples needed to feed the day laborers he employs.  Thus he needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies, seeds, etc. to be able to return to sowing.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Yessica Irassenia

texts.es:
Yessica es de la comarca las Bandera, casada, tiene una niña de 6 meses de edad. Ella  inicio su negocio vendiendo cuajada, crema y gaseosa .Actualmente ella tiene una pulpería,  su esposo trabaja como chofer en un camión, de esta manera ambos se apoyo para mantener a la familia.
 
Yessica solicita este crédito para comprar, azúcar, arroz, aceite, gaseosa y otros productos para surtir su pulpería, con este préstamo ella espera ofrecer mas productos a sus clientelas y mejorar su negocio porque la meta de ella es agregarle mas producto a su pulpería y satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes  y mejorar sus ingresos que le permita tener su negocio estable y rentable.
texts.en:
Yessica comes from the district of Bandera, is married and has a 6-month-old baby girl.  She started her business selling cream, curd and soda pop.  She currently has a small grocery store and her husband works as a truck driver.  By doing this, both Yessica and her husband are supporting the family.

Yessica is asking for this loan in order to buy sugar, rice, oil, soda pop and other products to stock up her grocery store.  With the loan, she is hoping to offer more products to her customers and improve her business.  Her goal is to offer more products so she can satisfy the needs of her customers, as well as to have a better income that will allow her to have a stable and profitable business.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, oil and soda pop.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad (pictured with his wife), an octogenerian farmer from Tlaxcala, is amazed that it's possible to produce fuel and fertilizer from his animals' waste. Although not completely convinced, he is excited to acquire his six-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester to see if anaerobic digestion actually works. 

With his system, Trinidad will reduce non-renewable fuel consumption, agrochemical fertilizer use, and move further towards self-sufficiency on his farm. This loan represents 34% of the total cost of Trinidad's Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: to purchase a six-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.name: Cinthia

texts.es:
La joven Cinthia tiene 31 años de edad es soltera, tiene 03  hijos que dependen de ella, se dedica desde hace 02 años al negocio de venta de ropa, calzado, achinería, cosméticos.
La Joven Cinthia vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos que ha diario le visitan, su venta la realiza en su casa y de forma ambulante, se traslada  a las aldeas y barrios aledaños a su comunidad.
La joven Cinthia está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, vestidos, calzonetas, sandalias, cremas, sombras, polvos y glas, ya que para esta época navideña  sus clientes le visitan bastante para comprar este tipo de productos.
La Joven Cinthia con el apoyo de este préstamo ella pretende mejorar sus ingresos y al igual mejorar un poco su calidad de vida. Su sueño es mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Cinthia, 31, is single young woman who has three dependent children.  She has made a living for two years selling clothing, footwear, sundries, and cosmetics.

Cinthia lives in a community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras.  Her customers are the friends and neighbors who visit her every day.  She makes her sales in her house and on foot, going to the towns and neighborhoods near her community.

Cinthia is requesting the loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear, sandals, creams, powder, glaze, and other merchandise.  Her customers visit her a lot during the Christmas season to buy this type of product.

With the support of this loan Cinthia plans to improve her income and her quality of life a little.  Her dream is to improve her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, November 2012

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Fredys Arsenio

texts.es:
Fredys, solicita un préstamo para invertir en la granja, se comprara cerdos, los cuales adquiere con el objetivo de engordar y comercializar, pues es su negocio, sacar ganancias de las ventas cuando los cerdos ya están gordos.
El considera que trabajar con préstamos para esta actividad le ha permitido tener una granja con suficientes cerdos, ha trabajado por su familia, generando una mejor condición con los ingresos.
texts.en:
Fredys is seeking a loan to invest in livestock. He will buy pigs which he will fatten and then sell, as this is his business. Once the pigs have fattened, he will be able to make a profit off them when sold. 

He believes that working with loans in this business has allowed him to have enough pigs for his business. He has worked for his family so that he could offer them better conditions with the earnings generated.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su esposo, tienen dos hijos, uno de ellos tiene 22 años y el otro 20 años de edad, el esposo de Ana se dedica a la agricultura y sus hijos al igual que ella colaboran en esta actividad.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, preparación de la tierra, para la siembra que realiza junto con su esposo, esta compra ayudara para que tengan lo necesario para realizar la siembra en una manzana de terreno.
El objetivo de Ana es con el préstamo realizar una buena compra, que esto permita que su negocio de mejores cosechas, con ello realizar ventas y de las ganancias ayudar a mejorar las condiciones de la familia.
texts.en: Ana is 39 years old.  She lives with her husband and they have two children.  One is 22 years old and the other is 20.  Ana’s husband earns a living with agriculture and their children, along with her, collaborate on this activity.  She is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizer, herbicides, and land preparation for the planting they will do together with her husband.  This purchase will help them to have what is necessary to do the planting in a plot of land.  Ana’s objective is, with the loan, to make a good purchase that will allow her business to have better harvests and with them to make sales and the earnings will improve the conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbacides, and land preparation.

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es:
Juana, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella se dedica a atender un cafetín el negocio está ubicado dentro de un centro escolar, de la localidad, lo atiende con una empleada todos los días de la semana.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el cafetín, comprando boquitas, gaseosas, dulces, galletas, maíz, frijoles, entre otra mercadería que sea necesaria, esto ayudara a mejorar en las temporadas que se acercan, ya que tiene demanda.
Su sueño es mejorar su casa, ya que necesita construirle un muro de retención, tambien ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Juana lives with her husband and a son; she works tending to a snack bar located in a local school; she has an employee that helps her every day of the week.  She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise for the snack bar.  She will buy packaged snacks, soft-drinks, candy, cookies, corn and beans, among any other necessary merchandise.  This will help her improve for the upcoming seasons since she has demand.  Her dream is to improve her house because it needs a retaining wall; also to help her husband with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft-drink, candy, cookies, corn and beans.

loans.name: Roxana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Roxana, está solicitando un préstamo por la necesidad de darle movimiento al negocio, realizando la compra de discos y grasa, para el mantenimiento del molino, con esta inversión le dará mas movimiento al servicio mejorando la calidad.
Ella considera que el préstamo que utilizo anteriormente, le permitió tener en buenas condiciones el molino, ha ofrecido una buena atención a los clientes, sus condiciones económicas han mejorado debido a los ingresos que recibe de los clientes.
texts.en:
Roxana is applying for a loan because she needs to move her business forward by buying disks and grease for maintaining the mill.  With this investment, she will improve the quality of service, moving it forward.  

She believes that the loan that she received previously allowed her to keep the mill in good condition, and has offered her clients good service.  Her economic situation has improved due to the income she receives from her customers.

loans.use: to buy disks and grease.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos para el negocio, como maíz, azúcar, bolsas, entre otros productos necesarios para la preparación de atoles, esto ayudara a que Carlos continúe mejorando sus ingresos. 
Con el préstamo anterior logro que sus ventas estuvieran mejor, atendiendo un buen número de clientes , lo que le ha permitido mejorar las ganancias para la familia, sus condiciones económicas están equilibradas.
texts.en:
Carlos is asking for a loan to buy business products such as corn, sugar, and bags among other necessary products to prepare atol [a dessert made of ground corn, cinnamon and milk]. This will help Carlos continue improving his income.

With the previous loan he managed to improve his sales by attending to a good number of clients, which has allowed him to improve earnings for his family. Their economic conditions are now balanced.

loans.use: to buy corn, sugar, and bags.

loans.name: Blanca Claudia

texts.es:
Blanca, administra un comedor y venta de bebidas, ella vive con sus dos hijos de 20 y 15 años de edad, dependen económicamente de los ingresos, el negocio de Blanca es la venta de comida y bebidas, lo hace con una amiga que le ayuda a atender todos los días de 6:00am a 7:00pm, este negocio existe desde hace 10 años.
Ella solicita un préstamo para poder mejorar el negocio, comprando mercadería como gaseosas, jugos, productos para elaborar la comida, aceite, carnes, pollo, condimentos, entre otros que son parte importante para fortalecer el negocio, con esto podrá crear un mejor ambiente.
Sus sueños son por el negocio mejorar su economía familiar, darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Blanca runs an eatery and sells beverages.  She lives with her two children who are 20 and 15 years old and dependent on her income.  Blanca’s business is selling food and beverages.  She does so with help from a girlfriend who helps her tend every day from 6am until 7pm.  The business has been in existence for 10 years.  She requests a loan to be able to improve the business.  She will buy merchandise like soft-drinks, juices, ingredients to make the food, oil, meats, chicken and condiments, among others that are an important part of strengthening the business; she will be able to create a better environment this way.  Her dream for the business is to improve her family economy and provide schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy oil, meats, chicken and condiments.

loans.name: Gaburel Kenyi

texts.en:
Gaburel is a 32-year-old businesswoman, who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 3 and 10 years. All of them go to school.

Gaburel runs a general store, and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She has no source of income besides this business.  She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 3500 SSP to purchase clothes, and many other things.

Within five years Gaburel would like to have expanded her business.  Her major challenges include high prices in the market. Gaburel says she is happy about the loans given by Finance south Sudan, with the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more items, like clothes, to resell in her store.

loans.name: Jose Camilo

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, tiene tres hijos de 16, 12 y7 años de edad, tiene  casa propia, vive con su esposa, el trabaja realizando la siembra de maíz y chile, lo aprendió  con sus padres, tiene como 20 años realizándolo.
José, solicita un préstamo para la invertir en la agricultura, sembrando maíz, frijol y chile, para esta actividad deberá comprar abono, herbicidas, foliares, pago de mano de obra, que son los necesarios para realizar el trabajo en la tierra.
Él manifiesta permanecer en su familia con lo necesario para cubrir la alimentación y gastos que sean necesarios para qué su familia este bien.
texts.en: José is a farmer.  He has three children, ages 16, 12 and 7.  He has his own home and he lives with his wife.  He works sowing corn and chilies.  He learned how to do it from his parents.  He has about 20 years of experience.  José is requesting a loan in order to invest it in agriculture, planting corn, beans, and chilies.  For this activity he should pay for manure, herbicide, fertilizer, and labor, which are what is necessary for working the land.  He expresses that he wants to remain with his family, providing food and covering necessary expense for his family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: To pay for manure, herbicide, fertilizer and labor.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel, se ha decidido por un préstamo para comprar repuestos de computadoras además comprara una antena repetidora de señal inalámbrica, así podrá vender señal de internet, tambien accesorios como mauses, monitores, memorias USB, discos duro.
El considera que estos préstamo han permitido mejorar, con un efecto positivo para que su negocio este en buenas condiciones, satisfaciendo en el servicio a los clientes, su condición en la familia se encuentra estable, desea ir mejorando el local y generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Israel has dedicated himself to a loan for the purchase of computer repairs. He will buy a wireless signal booster antenna so that he will be able to sell internet service as well as computer accessories such as mouse devices, monitors, USB drives, and hard drives.

He notes how these loans have allowed him to improve by providing a positive effect so that his business is in good condition, provides satisfactory service to his clients, and brings his family to a stable condition. He wants to continue improving the location and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy an antenna, mouse devices, monitors, USB drives, and hard drives.

loans.name: Bertha Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Bertha es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora es soltera, vive con  sus 5 hijos en un caserío de Choluteca al sur de Honduras. 
Doña Bertha realiza la actividad de compra y venta de gallinas y cerdos.
Doña Bertha necesita el préstamo para la compra de gallinas y cerdos, para ofrecer a los clientes, porque para esta temporada navideña se venden mucho y sus clientes ya le han encargo las gallinas y cerdos.
Doña Bertha espera  que sus  ventas aumenten y así poder cubrir sus necesidades gracias a que contara con capital  fresco para mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Doña Bertha sueña que al pasar 2 años su negocio este posicionado como  el negocio   más grande y  conocido de su caserío y poder así seguir apoyando a  sus hijos  para que se conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades.

Choluteca, Honduras  –  Noviembre del  2012
texts.en:
Bertha is an honest, responsible, hardworking person.  She’s single living with her five children in a settlement in Choluteca in south Honduras.  She is a chicken and pig merchant.  She needs the loan to buy chickens and pigs to offer to her customers because during the Christmas season they sell a lot and her customers have already placed orders for chickens and pigs.  Bertha hopes her sales will increase and she can cover basic needs thanks to having fresh capital to improve her and her family’s quality of life a little.  Bertha dreams that when her business reaches the two-year mark it will be established as the largest, best-known in her settlement so that she can continue supporting her children so that they will become upstanding citizens with better opportunities.

Choluteca, Honduras - November, 2012.

loans.use: to buy chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Francisca Alexia

texts.es:
Francisca, se dedica a la venta de ropa, necesita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de nuevas prendas de vestir, blusas, faldas, pantalones, tambien comprara un lote de lociones para vender, esto le ayudara a mejorar su condición de comerciante.
Con el préstamo anterior, tuvo un efecto positivo, ayudándole a que su negocio fuera rentable, con una mejor solvencia y ayudando a su familia en lo necesario.
texts.en: Francisca works selling clothes.  She needs a loan to buy new clothes: blouses, skirts and pants.  She will also buy a batch of lotions to sell.  This will help her improve her condition as a merchant.  Her previous loan had a positive effect in helping her to make her business more solvent and profitable and helped her family with what was necessary.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants and lotions.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
Evangelina, solicita un préstamo para la compra de accesorios para el molino, tambien invertirá en la compra de productos para la tienda, como fajas, bujillas, arroz, frijoles, jabón, aceite, son algunos de los productos que comprara, esto servirá para mantener el negocio, dando el servicio con el molino y la tienda. 
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo, le permitió mejorar el local del molino, comprar productos para el negocio, esto le dado mejor situación con su familia, manteniendo todo lo necesario, su deseo es mejorar continuamente su negocio.
texts.en: Evangelina is requesting a loan to buy accessories like belts and sparkplugs for her mill; she will also buy merchandise like rice, beans, soap and oil for the store.  These are just some of the things she’ll buy and it will serve to keep the business going providing both mill service and the store.  She had a positive effect with the previous loan.  She was able to improve the mill’s location and to buy products for the business.  This led to a better family situation; she had everything she needed.  Her wish is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy belts, spark plugs, rice, beans, soap and oil.

loans.name: Luis

texts.en:
Luis and his family decided together to purchase a 10-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester after hearing about the technology. 

Focused on saving money while reducing the environmental impact of his farm, Luis will use cow manure from his dairy cows to generate biogas and potent organic fertilizer. The methane-rich renewable biogas will allow his family to cut their consumption of the non-renewable LP gas they are currently using to heat bathwater and cook. 

Luis will also reduce the production costs of his maize and alfalfa by supplanting expensive agrochemical fertilizer with the organic fertilizer generated from his cows.  This loan represents 40% of the total cost of the Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: To purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester for his farm.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a 57-year-old conservative married woman, so she asked one of her daughters, Hala, to take her place in the photo.

Amneh is a mother of two sons and two daughters. One of them still goes to elementary school, while the others are university students. 

To be able to support her two daughters and son in the university and push them to continue and get a Bachelor’s degree, she decided to apply for this educational loan to pay for their semester fees.

loans.use: to pay her two daughters and son's semester fees.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en: Ms. Irshad is a 45-year-old married woman. She is an active lady who has been in the business of milk sales for many years. She has two cows. Her husband assists her in selling milk door-to-door. She has a good number of customers, which is increasing day by day. Her business is good enough to provide a decent life. She is a responsible mother of six children. Three of them are in school. She lives in large traditional family with her husband, children, and other relatives. She needs to earn more to cover the everyday expenditures of her family. She has requested a loan of 25,000 PKR. She will be using the loan along with her savings to buy one more buffalo to increase milk sales. She expects an increase in her business income. She intends to utilize the profits to provide good and quality education for her children.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to increase milk sales.

loans.name: Pulusila

texts.en: Pulusila  is 47 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, oil and a fryer. In the future, Pulusila hopes to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, oil, a fryer, etc.

loans.name: Candy Guadalupe

texts.es:
Candy, tiene 22 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 7 años de edad, ella es ama de casa y ayuda a su esposo en labores de agricultura, realizan la siembra de regadillo, esta actividad la realizan por descendencia de su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la siembra que realizan en esta temporada con su esposo, comprando semilla, abono y preparación del terreno, esta compra le ayudara para mejorar su cultivo, obteniendo mas ingresos. 
Su objetivo es fortalecer mas el cultivo, utilizando los insumos necesarios, recibir una buena cosecha y tambien en su familia le gustaría mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en: Candy, 22, is married and has two children who are 5 and 7 years old.  She’s a housewife and helps her husband with agricultural work.  They grow irrigated crops, an activity that’s been passed down from their family.  She’s asking for the loan to invest with her husband in the crop this season.  She will buy seed, manure and will prepare the soil.  This purchase will help her improve her crop obtaining higher income.  Her goal is to strengthen the crop more using the necessary supplies, to get a good crop yield and also would like to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and to prepare the soil.

loans.name: Rosa Claribel

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo por los buenos resultados que ha obtenido en los meses anteriores, ella se comprara harina, bandejas para hacer el pan, azúcar, harina suave, ella considera que esta inversión es necesaria para mejorar la producción.
Con el préstamo anterior ha tenido un efecto positivo ya que ha estado realizando ventas, con las ganancias obtenidas ha logrado mejorar las condiciones en su hogar, cubriendo lo más necesario.
texts.en:
Rosa has decided to take out a new loan because of the good results that she has received in the past months. She will buy trays to make bread, sugar, flour, and pastry flour. She considers this investment to be necessary to improve her production. 

She saw a positive effect with her previous loan since she has been making sales. With the earnings she's received, she has been able to improve the conditions in her home, covering all that is most needed.

loans.use: to buy trays to make bread and to buy sugar, flour and pastry flour.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
La señora Ana esta casada, tiene 47 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 2 hijos los cuales aun no estudian, se dedica a la confección de playeras, inicio este trabajo como operaria con un vecino y hasta ahora lleva 20 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que sera invertido para la compra de telas e hilos de diferentes clases y colores, y una maquina mas, espera en el futuro tener una maquila propia y también comprar, algunos animales domésticos, ya que piensa tener una granja.
texts.en:
Ana’s married and is 47-years-old; she never went to school.  She has two children who don’t attend school yet.  She works sewing t-shirts.  She started this work as an employee with a neighbor and to date has 20 years’ experience.  She has her husband’s support; he does the same kind of work.

She organized a group to request a loan to invest in the purchase of fabric and thread in various types and colors and another machine.  She hopes in future to have her own assembly shop and also to buy some domestic animals because she’s thinking about having a farm.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es: La socia  es la señora Felicitas, ella pertenece al banco “Los Lideres” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.  La socia continúa con su actividad en la elaboración de muebles para el hogar y la oficina en su taller de carpintería.  Felicitas como en oportunidades anteriores está solicitando el préstamo para comprar materiales como madera, pintura, pegamento y tapicería para la fabricación de sus muebles. Felicitas está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle continuar con su actividad económica la cual representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia.
texts.en: Felicitas is a member of the “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She continues with her activity manufacturing home and office furniture in her carpentry shop.  Like in previous occasions, Felicitas is requesting a loan to buy supplies like wood, paint, glue and upholstery fabric to manufacture her furniture.  Felicitas is very grateful to Kiva for making it possible for her to continue with her economic activity which is her main source of income and family support.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint, glue and upholstery fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 1/2 and 1 inch pieces of iron, C channel beams, and square iron

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy pigs.

loans.name: Delia Elizabeth

texts.es: La socia  es la señora Delia, ella pertenece al banco “Los Lideres” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.  La socia continúa con su actividad en la elaboración de elementos de artesanía, principalmente en tejidos de prendas de vestir como chompas, bufandas guantes, gorros, etc.  y los distribuye en los diferentes mercados artesanales de la ciudad. Delia como en oportunidades anteriores está solicitando el préstamo para comprar materiales como lanas de oveja, de alpaca, hilos y accesorios para el tejido de sus prendas de vestir. Delia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle continuar con su actividad económica la cual representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia.
texts.en: Delia is a member of the “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She continues with her activity making crafts, especially knitting articles of clothing like sweaters, scarves, mittens, caps, etc. that she sells in various crafts markets in the city.  Like in previous occasions, Delia is requesting a loan to buy supplies like sheep and alpaca wool, thread and accessories to knit clothing items.  Delia is very grateful to Kiva for making it possible for her to continue with her economic activity which is her main source of income and family support.

loans.use: to buy sheep wool yarn, alpaca wool, thread and accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Olandina

texts.en: Olindina runs a kiosk in front of her house. She opened the kiosk two years ago with working capital of $1.000.00. She has been looking for more working capital to improve her business and is now applying for a loan from Tuba Rai Metin (TRM) to purchase additional supplies including sugar, coffee, noodles, candles, and candies. She lives in a simple house made of zinc and bricks for walls. She wants to improve her living conditions with the income.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, noodles, candles, and candies.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama sells banku (maize and cassava dough) in Emissa Krom, near Cape Coast. Ama is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. 

Ama has been selling  banku and yams for 22 years. She is responsible for paying her children's school fees, as her husband is responsible for other household expenses. 

Her loan will be used to buy bags of maize to prepare her banku for sale. She hopes to use the new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize to prepare her banku for sale.

loans.name: Damiana

texts.en: Damiana runs a kiosk in front of her home to supply people in her village with basic goods. She will purchase additional supplies for her store with the requested loan, including biscuits, cigarettes, candies and drinks. She opened her kiosk two years ago. Damiana also has land to cultivate corn, vegetables and bananas. She lives in an old house made of palm branches and zinc. She wants to open a big store in the future

loans.use: to buy biscuits, cigarettes, candies and drinks.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph used the previous loan to buy general merchandise to sell. He is a 43-year-old father of seven children who operates a retail business in Kagadi,Uganda. He has operated this business for 16 years. Joseph started as a market vendor and accumulated capital, then started a retail shop. He says inadequate capital is the hindering factor towards the growth of this business. He would like to educate his children and he wants to move the business to a more permanent location. Joseph intends to use the loan to buy soap, sodas, and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap, sodas, and sugar to sell.
